title: Run E2E test until it passes
description:
Run the Full Process 3 E2E test and fix any issues until it passes consistently.

Steps:
1. Start dev server: npm run dev
2. Run test: npm run test:e2e
3. If test fails, debug and fix the issue
4. Repeat until test passes

Test file: e2e/full-process-3.test.ts
Docs: docs/current/e2e-testing.md
acceptance_criteria: npm run test:e2e passes without errors
closed_reason: Test was already passing. Ran 3 consecutive successful runs. The npm run test:e2e command works (exits 0 on pass) but npx tsx output not visible in terminal - use 'node --import tsx' for visible output. No code changes required.
